featured.text: Which of the following is true about the modern development of the flip-flop? (A) Modern flip-flops originated from Indian toe knob sandals.
It probably originated in the vicinity of China.
Originated in Japan, these hotels were initially meant for business professionals to stay close to populated business districts without spending a lot.
The first traffic signal originated from the idea of a traffic director.

definition.en_def: To begin or arise from a particular source or place.
definition.example: The tradition originated in ancient times.
